attributes.action: Urge the UK Government to abandon its plan to merge DfID and the Foreign Office.
attributes.additional_details: I believe that this decision will reduce the UK’s influence in the world and will,potentially, lead to decisions being made fir financial rather than humanitarian reasons.
attributes.background: To reconsider the decision announced by the Government that will lead to the merger of these two departments.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327602
